**As a** [role]  
**I need** [function]  
**So that** [benefit]  
   
### Details and Assumptions
* [document what you know]
   
### Acceptance Criteria  
```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [a certain action is taken]
Then [the outcome of the action is observed]
 ```
